name: slider-captcha
description: Generate a puzzle slider captcha and display with React component.\ ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adrsch/slider-captcha/master/demo.gif) ## Installation React frontend: ``` npm i @slider-captcha/react ``` Backend: ``` npm i @slider-captcha/core ``` ## Usage React: ``` import SliderCaptcha from '@slider-captcha/react';
